verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Can a nation be changed?
Can a nation be saved?
Can a nation be turned back to you?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We're on our knees,
We're on our knees again.
We're on our knees,
We're on our knees again...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let this nation be changed,
Let this nation be saved.
Let this nation be turned back to you.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We're on our knees,
We're on our knees again.
We're on our knees,
We're on our knees again...
